config.sodden.general.consumes_water.too: If true, watering cans will consume water when refilled.
config.sodden.general.cooldown.tooltip: The cooldown (in ticks) between watering can usages.
config.sodden.general.fake_players_allow: If true, fake players are allowed to use watering cans.
config.sodden.general.use_growth_tick_co: If true, watering cans will use hard-coded checks
on top of the defined tag to apply growth ticks.
config.sodden.general.use_bonemeal_compa: If true, watering cans will use hard-coded checks
on top of the defined tag to apply bonemeal.
config.sodden.general.use_spread_tick_co: If true, watering cans will use hard-coded checks
on top of the defined tag to apply spread ticks.
